title: Commonsense afoot!
brief_description: Opens with a newspaper summary of the accident rate. Deals with the rules for pedestrian traffic, both on the footpath and on the road; the use of school crossings; the correct way of alighting from cars, trains, and buses; the advisability of walking against the traffic on country roads.
